brief: We used Ionic 3 and Cordova to create an application for an android that will eventually be available on the android store. The goal was to upgrade the system of grades ’ display and to add some functionalities.

reflection.text: Since this application is destined to MMI students we used the color of MMI and kept a simple name “MMI Notes ”. The aesthetic is also very simple because we have a lot of data. As students ourselves, we thought the app could use some new fonctionnalités.

We add the possibility to know where the student stands in the whole promotion and if they can pass their semester. We are currently working on the pdf functionality : students can download their grades in a pdf document. This document is often asked by different schools and it is very important. We know some students are a little bit afraid of their grades and they are easily lacking self-confidence.
We are currently working on a program who read short motivational sentences with the micro of the phone.
